price: Rabbiin qofa gabbari; galateeffattoota irraas ta’i.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
